identity.name: SafarAI Intelligence
principles: Fusion: Military Precision x Luxury Travel
Clarity: High-contrast signals for busy executives
Depth: Glassmorphism and grid borders to create hierarchy

structure.sidebar: hidden md:flex flex-col w-64 border-r border-white/10 bg-[#020617]

buttons.primary: bg-blue-600 hover:bg-blue-500 text-white shadow-[0_0_15px_rgba(59,130,246,0.4)] rounded-none uppercase tracking-wider font-bold text-xs px-6 py-3 transition-all
buttons.secondary: bg-transparent border border-white/20 hover:border-white/50 text-white rounded-none uppercase tracking-wider text-xs px-6 py-3
buttons.destructive: bg-rose-900/20 border border-rose-500/50 text-rose-400 hover:bg-rose-900/40 rounded-none uppercase tracking-wider text-xs

status_badges.success: bg-emerald-500/10 text-emerald-400 border border-emerald-500/20 px-2 py-0.5 text-[10px] uppercase tracking-widest rounded-sm
status_badges.warning: bg-amber-500/10 text-amber-400 border border-amber-500/20 px-2 py-0.5 text-[10px] uppercase tracking-widest rounded-sm
